Interface Meta.Builder<B extends Meta.Builder<B> & Entity.Builder<B>>

Type Parameters:
B - the builder type
All Superinterfaces:
Entity, Entity.Builder<B>, Meta, Supplier<CharSequence>
Enclosing interface:
Meta
public static interface Meta.Builder<B extends Meta.Builder<B> & Entity.Builder<B>> extends Meta, Entity.Builder<B>
Responsible for providing an easy way to build a meta instance used when logging
